family.name: AC1
family.comment: AC1 is an animation accessory decoder with secondary OPS access as a LOCO

variable.label: Manufacturer ID
variable.tooltip: Manufacturer ID READ ONLY, except writing 8 will do a factory reset to clean, new in the box conditions
variable.label: Manufacturer ID
High Address
variable.tooltip: Decoder address high part, use this if the address is greater than 127
variable.label: High Address
Index page address high byte
variable.comment: high byte of indexed address 10H for standard NMRA or 0 for special 128 pages
variable.label: Index page address high byte
Index page address low byte
variable.comment: low byte of indexed address page, this forms address bits 8 to 15 for NMRA index or bits 7 to 14 for special 128 byte index pages
variable.label: Index page address low byte

factReset.label: Reset all CVs to factory defaults

display.tooltip: set 9 bit accessory decoder address Range 1-510

label.label: To help you manage the current drawn by the servos
You can limit the number of servos running at once

display.tooltip: min 1 max 8

label.label: LOCO OPERATIONS mode programming access for command programmers that don't support accessory decoders
any long or short address of 1 to 16,383
check box to LOCK OUT this LOCO address from OPS mode
OR uncheck to allow LOCO address from OPS mode

display.tooltip: bit mask to flash LED1 for OPS ack
time to flash the LED for OPS ack

label.label: Indexed 128 byte Window page for animation FLASH program access on older command stations
This was added to allow programmers that limit CVs to 1 to 256 to access the 24K of FLASH
Be sure to 'change' and write changes to the addresses before reading or changing the page
Indexed 256 byte Window page for animation FLASH program access using NMRA index CV31 and CV32
This gives programmers using NMRA ''indexed pages'' access to the 24K of FLASH
Be sure to 'change' and write changes to the addresses before reading or changing the page
Page256index high MUST always be 10 Hex

display.label: Servo minimum position
display.tooltip: Set lower limit of servo, default 16

display.label: Servo maximum position
display.tooltip: Set lower limit of servo, default 16
Set lower limit of servo, default 16
Set upper limit of servo, default 180
move time in 0.1 seconds
select one of 16 motion tables
map this logical servo to a physical servo
swap close and throw switch function
reverse the LED close and throw functions
use LED1 and LED2 for tri color instead of 2 LEDS
on power up set switch closed or open

display.label: panel switch enabled
display.tooltip: Enables panel switch control of turnout
